data.actual_result: It is the same as the first music in the title
data.expected_result: It's supposed to be the same music title as the current one
data.short_description: Spotify playlist embed's music title changes to the first music in the playlist after picking an another server then picking the music's server
data.steps_to_repro: - Paste a Spotify link to get an embed - Have the app, then choose any music other than the first one - Pick a server - Pick the server that the music was playing - Observe the music title
